# esctheme

The `esctheme` package helps you create ggplot2 charts in the Essential
Services Commission of Victoria style.

### Installation

If you havenâ€™t already, install the `remotes` package:

`install.packages("remotes")`

Then install from GitHub:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
remotes::install_github("ESC-Economics/esctheme", dependencies = TRUE, upgrade = "always")
```

Then load into R:

[`library(esctheme)`](https://esc-economics.github.io/esctheme/)

### Using esctheme

The [package website](https://esc-economics.github.io/esctheme/)
contains a lot of information on how to use esctheme.

Start by reading the [Get
started](https://esc-economics.github.io/esctheme/articles/esctheme.md)
article.

There is also a wealth of information contained in the individual
[function
documentation](https://esc-economics.github.io/esctheme/reference/index.md)
that answers common usage questions.

# Package index

## All functions

- [`esc_aqua`](https://esc-economics.github.io/esctheme/reference/esc_aqua.md)
  : Palette generator for esc_aqua
- [`esc_blue`](https://esc-economics.github.io/esctheme/reference/esc_blue.md)
  : Palette generator for esc_blue
- [`esc_deepgreen`](https://esc-economics.github.io/esctheme/reference/esc_deepgreen.md)
  : Palette generator for esc_deepgreen
- [`esc_magenta`](https://esc-economics.github.io/esctheme/reference/esc_magenta.md)
  : Palette generator for esc_magenta
- [`esc_orange`](https://esc-economics.github.io/esctheme/reference/esc_orange.md)
  : Palette generator for esc_orange
- [`esc_palette()`](https://esc-economics.github.io/esctheme/reference/esc_palette.md)
  : Predefined ESC colours combined into palettes
- [`esc_red`](https://esc-economics.github.io/esctheme/reference/esc_red.md)
  : Palette generator for esc_red
- [`esc_save()`](https://esc-economics.github.io/esctheme/reference/esc_save.md)
  : Save a ESC styled plot with sensible defaults
- [`esc_theme()`](https://esc-economics.github.io/esctheme/reference/esc_theme.md)
  : Create a ggplot2 theme consistent with the ESC style guide.
- [`esc_theme_sf()`](https://esc-economics.github.io/esctheme/reference/esc_theme_sf.md)
  : Create a ggplot2 spatial theme consistent with the ESC style guide.
- [`esc_yellow`](https://esc-economics.github.io/esctheme/reference/esc_yellow.md)
  : Palette generator for esc_yellow
- [`format_flip()`](https://esc-economics.github.io/esctheme/reference/format_flip.md)
  : Applies changes to the theme for horizontal bar graphs
- [`plot_label()`](https://esc-economics.github.io/esctheme/reference/plot_label.md)
  : Add on-graph labels to graphs
- [`r_setup()`](https://esc-economics.github.io/esctheme/reference/r_setup.md)
  : Loads core packages for workflow
- [`summarise_by()`](https://esc-economics.github.io/esctheme/reference/summarise_by.md)
  : Calculate summary statistics
- [`trail_avg()`](https://esc-economics.github.io/esctheme/reference/trail_avg.md)
  : Moving average for long data
